detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket with a small text print, and short slits in the sides.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck and long sleeves. Wrapover front and an adjustable tie with a round buckle at one side.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Leather toe-post sandals with padded heel insoles and kitten heels. Leather insoles and soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Cable-knit jumper knitted in a soft wool and mohair blend with a V-neck, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a jacquard-knit motif, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves. Roll-edge neckline with a sewn-on bow, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend and leggings in cotton jersey. Top in a slightly longer style with dropped shoulder seams, long sleeves, discreet front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The ribbing at the hem is slightly shorter at the front and has two slits. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides, pointed toes and covered block heels. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 10 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a high collar and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Partially concealed tab with a button and inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Thin metal curb chain necklace with a trigger clasp.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Fleece-lined tube scarf in jersey with a text print.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut back. Three pairs of narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Fitted, knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a knot detail at the front and elastication at the back. Unlined.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Narrow tie in a satin weave. Width 5 cm.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and seam with a wide lace band at the waist. Concealed zip at the back and a voluminous, flared skirt. Lined bodice and skirt.
Blouse in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.
Metal earrings with a large, heart-shaped pendant with a sparkly stone decoration in the shape of an eye. Length 9 cm.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is rounded and slightly longer at the back. Tiered skirt with an elasticated waist.

Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a small, gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a collar and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details and glittery sections. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with ties at the neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves with grosgrain trims down the sides. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with block heels and a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel approx. 9 cm.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool and mohair blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt jacket in sturdy, washed cotton denim with smooth buttons. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke and decorative seam at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and flannel bottoms. Top with a round neck and chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fine-knit hooded jumper in a soft viscose blend with a motif on the front, long sleeves with gathered seams, and a drawstring at the hem.
Coat in a woven wool blend with a hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Jacket in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightly padded, quilted nylon jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide, flared legs with raw-edge hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Sleeveless top in a gently draping viscose weave with short, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y), a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads.
Large metal earrings decorated with sequins and faceted plastic beads. Length approx. 8 cm.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a low-cut neckline.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, gentle V-neck at the front, long sleeves and a wide elasticated hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Sturdy body with a shaping effect on the waist, seat and thighs. Low neckline, adjustable shoulder straps and short legs. Seamless.
Cropped top in a soft knit containing some wool with wide shoulder straps and a narrow, ribbed trim at the hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Long skirt in woven fabric with a draped front, high slit and asymmetric hem. High waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined at the top.
Mesh trainers with an intarsia motif, padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a frill at the top and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with side pockets. Unlined.
Microfibre and mesh Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.

Long dress in airy chiffon crêpe made partly from recycled polyester. V-neck with a large flounce at the top, a seam at the waist and a wide, straight-cut skirt. Low-cut back with narrow horizontal ties, and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Tiered skirt in glittery-patterned tulle with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Soft nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with opening, moulded cups with space for nursing pads and flexi-wire underwiring. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Headband in fast-drying functional fabric with a reflective print. Width 8.5 cm.
Patterned advent calendar with 24 compartments each concealing a pair of earrings, a necklace or a ring.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Elasticated waist with a twisted drawstring and one back pocket.

Patterned set with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts. The top has a wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication, and decorative ties at the hem. Wide shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets with a scalloped trim and smocked hems.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim Fit.
Wide shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
